item.name: Evil Bone
item.detail:
"Skill Up & Ascension Material"
Ominous bones wielding curses.

item.name: Octuplet Crystals
item.detail:
"Skill Up & Ascension Material"
A multi-crystal created within a golem's body.

item.name: Serpent Jewel
item.detail:
"Skill Up & Ascension Material"
A jewel as if you are being stared by serpent eyes.

item.name: Forbidden Page
item.detail:
"Skill Up & Ascension Material"
A page which nobody should ever read.
Usually mixed in as the first or last page.

item.name: Void's Dust
item.detail:
"Skill Up & Ascension Material"
Dust that disperses when hollow shadows disappear.

item.name: Eternal Gear
item.detail:
"Skill Up & Ascension Material"
Dream of an eternal machine.
A gear that spins forever once it starts turning.

item.name: Phoenix Feather
item.detail:
"Skill Up & Ascension Material"
Feather from a sacred bird of the Orient.

item.name: Heart of the Foreign God
item.detail:
"Skill Up & Ascension Material"
The heart of a savage demi-god.
A god is a god, even if it's a fake.
Its heartbeat emits many curses.

item.name: Proof of Hero
item.detail:
"Skill Up & Ascension Material"
Proof that you've been acknowledged as a hero.
Many possess it, but they aren't 
conscious of it so they forget.

item.name: Seed of Yggdrasil
item.detail:
"Skill Up & Ascension Material"
A seed of a giant tree that symbolizes the world.

item.name: Dragon Fang
item.detail:
"Skill Up & Ascension Material"
The fang of a dragon. Dragon Tooth Warriors are created using these fangs.

item.name: Ghost Lantern
item.detail:
"Skill Up & Ascension Material"
Lantern that uses souls as fuel to burn.

item.name: Meteor Horseshoe
item.detail:
"Skill Up & Ascension Material"
A tough horseshoe made of metal from a meteor.
Even if the elements are the same, since it wasn't created on Earth, it has a special role.

item.name: Homunculus Baby
item.detail:
"Skill Up & Ascension Material"
The body of a young homunculus before a soul is written into it.

item.name: Claw of Chaos
item.detail:
"Skill Up & Ascension Material"
Those wounded by this claw become prisoners of chaos.

item.name: Dragon's Reverse Scale
item.detail:
"Skill Up & Ascension Material"
A scale that grew upside-down under a dragon's chin.

item.name: Crystallized Lore
item.detail:
"Skill Up & Ascension Material"
A highly pure crystal of magic created
when human history crosses a stream of Mana.
It can be said that it is the ingredient for materializing Heroic Spirits.

item.name: Stake of Wailing Night
item.detail:
"Skill Up & Ascension Material"
A stake driven into a corpse to prevent its reanimation.
It never rusts, and retains its luster by absorbing blood.
It can even pierce otherworldly beings that lurk in the dark of night.

item.name: Shell of Reminiscence
item.detail:
"Skill Up & Ascension Material"
The shell of a clam that has lived for an eternity.
When you put your ear against the aperture, you can hear the sounds of pure waves from the distant past.

item.name: Tearstone of Blood
item.detail:
"Skill Up & Ascension Material"
The crystal of the tear shed by a giant eyeball-like creature when it dies.
A strong curse is residing within this crystal.

item.name: Cursed Beast Gallstone
item.detail:
"Skill Up & Ascension Material"
A stone whose curse fermented in the innards of a hexed beast.
It continues to release a strong curse that will never fade.

skills.name: Iron Determination EX
skills.detail: Apply Ignore Invincible (1 turn) & increase ATK (1 turn) & Debuff Resist (3 turns) for yourself

buffs.name: Ignore Invincible
buffs.detail: Ignore Evade and Invincible to deal damage

skills.name: Wisdom of Crisis A
skills.detail: Decrease one enemy's Charge + remove your Debuffs + gain C. Stars

classPassive.name: Avenger A
classPassive.detail: Increase the amount of NP you gain when damaged + Decrease Debuff Resist for all allies (including sub-members) except yourself [Demerit]

buffs.name: NP Gain Up When Damaged
buffs.detail: Increase amount of NP gained when taking damage

classPassive.name: Self-Restoration (Magical Energy) D
classPassive.detail: Increase NP Gauge each turn for yourself

buffs.name: NP Gain Per Turn
buffs.detail: Gain NP at end of each turn

extraPassive.name: Doujin A
extraPassive.detail: Increase Doujin Motivation & Doujin Technique & Doujin Imagination amount per drop by 30% & increase Bond gained when completing quests by 20% [Event Only]

extraPassive.name: Swordbeauty's Knowledge B
extraPassive.detail: Increase your ATK Strength by 30% in "All In! Las Vegas Championship Match - Seven Duels of Swordbeauties!" & increase Bond gained when completing quests by 20% [Event Only]

buffs.name: Swordbeauty's Knowledge
buffs.detail: Increase damage dealt in "All In! Las Vegas Championship Match - Seven Duels of Swordbeauties!"

extraPassive.name: Power of Bonds E
extraPassive.detail: Increase your ATK Strength by 20% in "Final Singularity: The Grand Temple of Time Solomon"

extraPassive.name: Power of Bonds D
extraPassive.detail: Increase your ATK Strength by 40% in "Final Singularity: The Grand Temple of Time Solomon"

extraPassive.name: Power of Bonds C
extraPassive.detail: Increase your ATK Strength by 60% in "Final Singularity: The Grand Temple of Time Solomon"

extraPassive.name: Power of Bonds B
extraPassive.detail: Increase your ATK Strength by 75% in "Final Singularity: The Grand Temple of Time Solomon"

extraPassive.name: Power of Bonds A
extraPassive.detail: Increase your ATK Strength by 90% in "Final Singularity: The Grand Temple of Time Solomon"

extraPassive.name: Power of Bonds EX
extraPassive.detail: Increase your ATK Strength by 100% in "Final Singularity: The Grand Temple of Time Solomon"

extraPassive.name: Permeation of Evil
extraPassive.detail: Bond gained upon clearing "Pseudo-Singularity I: Quarantined Territory of Malice, Shinjuku" main quests increased by 100%

noblePhantasms.name: Enfer Château d'If
noblePhantasms.detail: Deal heavy damage to all enemies & decrease DEF (3 turns) <effect increases with Overcharge> & inflict Curse (5 turns) <effect increases with Overcharge> for all enemies

buffs.name: Curse
buffs.detail: Lose HP at end of each turn

noblePhantasms.name: Enfer Château d'If
noblePhantasms.detail: Deal heavy damage ▲ & decrease DEF (3 turns) <effect increases with Overcharge> & inflict Curse (5 turns) <effect increases with Overcharge> & inflict Disastrous Curse (increase Curse damage) ▲ (5 turns) to all enemies.

buffs.name: Curse
buffs.detail: Lose HP at end of each turn

1100230.name: Monte Cristo Selection
1100230.detail: The Count of Monte Cristo's summer attire. He actually really likes the inflatable tube, but won't admit it.

comments.comment:
The world's most well known seeker of vengeance.
Known as "The Count of Monte Cristo."
Entrapped by a cruel plot and convicted of a crime he didn't commit, he was sent to the nightmarish Château d'If. His iron will kept him from falling into despair, and with the treasure of Monte Cristo island in hand he returned to Paris.
There he exacted a terrible revenge upon the city's most influential people who had betrayed him to become so.

Height/Weight: 185cm, 75kg
Origin: Dumas' "The Count of Monte Cristo"?
Region: France
Alignment: Chaotic-Evil
Gender: Male
His favorite phrase is "Attendre et espérer," which translates to "Wait and hope."

His dreadful life, his path of vengeance, his devotion to his beloved Mercédès, his struggle and regret, and finally his path to repentance... It is a story beloved by the people of France and the world that features him as the "World's Greatest Seeker of Vengeance."

The story of the Count of Monte Cristo was written by Alexandre Dumas and is a work of fiction. However, the existence of the priest who gave Edmond guidance within the Château d'If, Abbé Faria, has been confirmed...

His True Name is Edmond Dantès, but he considers himself a different person than the "Edmond Dantès" who was a sailor in Marseille.
His reasoning is that at the end of his quest for vengeance, "Edmond Dantès" abandoned his evil nature...but this Servant continues to be a personification of vengeance. Thus, he says, he is not Edmond.

『Monte Cristo Mythology』
Rank: C
NP Type: Anti-Personnel
Range: N/A　Maximum Targets: 1
He is the personification of vengeance itself. He doesn't belong to any single class, and is summoned as an Extra Class, Avenger. When he materializes as an Avenger, the tales of his lifetime have been elevated to the status of Noble Phantasm and grant him a superhuman physique.
In addition to his physique, he can use magical energy to attack and conceal his own stats and class.

This Noble Phantasm is constantly active. It has an extra effect when his True Name is released, but it is not used in this game.

『Enfer Château d'If』
Rank: A
NP Type: Anti-Personnel/Anti-Army
Range: 1-20　Maximum Targets: 1-100
The manifestation of his iron will, trained within the hellish Château d'If. He can escape not only the prison of his body, but also the formless prisons of time and space.
By accelerating his thought processes and forcing his body to reflect them, he can move at incredibly high speeds.
To those observing his movements, it might look like he has the ability to stop time.

In this game, his high-speed movements enable him to create clones and attack multiple times simultaneously.

I am the Count of Monte Cristo.
I know neither love nor compassion. Until I burn everything to cinders, I will remain an Avenger, fueled by hatred and vengeance to make myself a brightly burning black flame of rage.
My beloved Haydée does not exist in this world, and thus, I will be a vengeful demon for eternity...

voiceLines.name: Birthday
voiceLines.subtitle:
Congratulations Master!
This is the day you were born into a world filled with hardships!

voiceLines.name: During an Event
voiceLines.subtitle:
We'll be late to the party.
Hurry. Frenzy and mania are waiting.

voiceLines.name: Conversation 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Can you show me the path, just like the Abbé?

voiceLines.name: Conversation 3
voiceLines.subtitle:
I only have one mentor in life.
Abbé Faria...

voiceLines.name: Likes
voiceLines.subtitle:
What do I like?
That no longer holds any meaning for me.
All I have is determination filled with darkness.

voiceLines.name: Dislikes
voiceLines.subtitle:
Of course I hate it!
Aah! The world! Everything!

voiceLines.name: About the Holy Grail
voiceLines.subtitle:
The Holy Grail, a vessel of desire which fulfills wishes...
I'm sure it's stuffed full.
Full of human desires... of everything evil.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 1
voiceLines.subtitle:
If you say you are my Master then at least show me something.
What? Don't be nervous.
I'm not expecting anything.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 2
voiceLines.subtitle:
My name is the Count of Monte Cristo.
My True Name is the same.
I've already abandoned the name Edmond Dantès along with my past.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 3
voiceLines.subtitle:
I am the Count of Monte Cristo.
I am not the Edmond who struggled with revenge and was saved by regret and reform.
I am the notorious incarnation of vengeance, the Avenger.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 4
voiceLines.subtitle:
Be careful.
I am made of grudges, vengeance, and poisonous flames which bring death to whoever touches them.
Be prepared for the consequences if you touch them.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 5
voiceLines.subtitle:
...What are you?
To associate with me so much, it's just like...
No, you are not like Haydée.
You are you.

voiceLines.name: Conversation 4
voiceLines.subtitle:
Oh-ho? There is another who has materialized as an Avenger.
I despise human nature, he laughs at it...
I see. People are inexplicable.

voiceLines.name: Conversation 5
voiceLines.subtitle: There's another Extra Class here... Interesting.

voiceLines.name: Conversation 6
voiceLines.subtitle:
There's an artist-type Caster here.
Very well.
Waiter, bring him a coffee!

voiceLines.name: Conversation 7
voiceLines.subtitle:
Who is he?
Ah, I see...
Napoleon Bonaparte. So that emperor has finally manifested.
I won't meet with him right now.
But one of these days...

voiceLines.name: Ascension 1
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 1100200_0_G030]This is how it should be.
[id 1100200_0_G031]You've made the right choice.

voiceLines.name: Ascension 4
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 1100200_0_G050]I follow an endless path.
[id 1100200_0_G051]I'll show you too, [id 1100200_0_G052]that which lies beyond love and hate.

voiceLines.name: Summon
text: [r]Well precisely, I am the grudge of darkness
voiceLines.subtitle:
You called me! The reincarnation of vengence itself?
Well precisely, I am the grudge of darkness
I am Extra Class, Avenger!

voiceLines.name: Battle Start 1
voiceLines.subtitle: You... What do I look like to you!

voiceLines.name: Victory 1
voiceLines.subtitle:
...Fall into despair!
That itself is... Hell.

voiceLines.name: Victory 2
voiceLines.subtitle:
I'll show no mercy.
Die and rot away completely.

voiceLines.name: Noble Phantasm
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 1100200_0_B050]I follow a path beyond love and hate!
[id 1100200_0_B051,1100200_0_B052]Enfer Château d'If!

voiceLines.name: About Spiritron Dress
voiceLines.overwriteName: About Spiritron Dress Monte Cristo Selection
voiceLines.subtitle:
Appearances mean nothing.
But...
Hmph. If something like this inspires you, then I see no reason to put a stop to it.

voiceLines.name: Noble Phantasm Card
voiceLines.overwriteName: Noble Phantasm Card Monte Cristo Selection
voiceLines.subtitle: Shut up, shut up!
